author: Rafael Sanchez
text: 'Terrible service. Rude owner. Terrible
column5: awful
column6: bad service. Keep taking the orders wrong. When I complained the owner and the front of the house were incredibly rude to me. Outrageous. They are a mess!'

author: I M
text: 'Tasty treats'

author: Hank Zhang
text: 'Shrimp tempura in rolls were not freshly cooked. They were cold and soggy. Yellowtail had a strong fishy taste. The sushi rice was also not freshly made
column5: maybe leftover from previous night.'

author: Michael Milazzo
text: 'Very good sushi
column5: happy they have Re opened..'

author: Anthony Bamonte
text: 'Amazing sushi
column5: and the hot fried stuff is great too. My friends had their wedding reception here and everything was fantastic.'

author: Aakash Hotwani
text: 'Sushi kept falling apart. Over stuffed 5 rolls in two boxes. Terrible taste. Worst sushi I’ve ever had.'

author: Regina Marques
text: "Food was terrible. We have to asked many times to take our order.\nWaiters  dropped his food on the table and didn't mention who every dish was. Also  everyone finished
column5: he started taking out the dishes and brought the bill without asking….\ni don't recommend it\ndirty bathrooms"

author: Gabriela Emiliano
text: 'I personally did not have a good experience at this place. Nobody sat us down
column5: and we had to notify the restaurant twice that we were outside ready to be served. The food took too long. We ordered the food at 6 and we ended up getting it at 7:30. After we ate
column6: we had to wait for the check for another 45 min. I have never been in a restaurant with such a poor time management. I loved the scenery but it was not worth it.'

author: Sean Brown
text: "Hands down the best and freshest sushi I've ever had!!!"

author: Fernando Flores Redondo
text: 'Great food and reasonable price.'

author: Stephanie Benitez
text: 'Finally I’ll say that I find the perfect place to eat sushi! Everything was good
column5: fresh food
column6: nice presentation
column7: I can’t complain! I’m very satisfied with this place! I’ll order again and make it my sushi place!!! Highly recommended!!!'

author: harish sista
text: 'Vegetarians never order from this place
column5: not a good customer service! I asked for an avocado peanut roll
column6: and they gave me eel and avocado. When I tried to reason with them
column7: they didn’t give me time to choose
column8: and they kept cutting my calls when I called back. Such a waste of money and time!'

author: Jason G
text: "Pick up the phone! Driver switched our order with another customer. Our order was 3 times the price! Called the restaurant numerous times. They don't answer the phone. Never again! I'll give my business to Ayame instead."

author: Leonardo Hill
text: 'They offer a nice variety of fresh food. I enjoy dining here. Staff members are always super nice
column5: rates are reasonable and the spot is always clean.'

author: Frank Manza
text: 'Food was delicious
column5: friendly wait staff
column6: very accommodating. Byob'

author: Len Romano
text: "Atmosphere: 4.2\nClean
column5: good music
column6: good lighting
column9:
even heated our BYOB sake.
Food freshness: 4.7
They pumped out sushi all night. Extremelyfresh.
Food presentation: 4.5
Beautiful sushi arrangement. Not crazy about plastic flower decorations
column10: but it didn't take away from the overall presentation.\nWould definitely go back."

author: Najla Jones
text: 'Great food but they are very slow!'

author: Ralf274
text: 'Really good sushi!'

author: Jason Brown
text: 'Oh man... dang what can I say!!! This place is off the chain. The sushi was fresh
column5:
the service was tight and the prices right! What more can you ask for?

Wait I can tell... you are able to BYOB (bring your own bottle). They don’t serve alcohol but you can take your booze in and they will even open and pot for ya.

We took a bottle of wine and that just enriched the experience. Go check them out.'

text: 'Very nice place - liked the sushi. But a little crowded and service can be slow as a result

text: 'Sushi wasn’t fresh'

author: Kristina Bodnya
text: 'First time eating top quality sushi since the quarantine began. So glad you’re open again. Super fresh and delicious sushi were delivered even 30 minutes earlier. Great restaurant!'

author: Ning Fu
text: 'Packed wrong items for me and showed such poor attitude when I called. The guy insisted he couldn’t make a mistake because mine was the only order at that time. He even shouted at me: you don’t know what eel is! Fine
column5: it’s not your mistake but mine - I shouldn’t have placed the only order.'

author: RD C
text: "Truly great sushi spot!  Amazingly fresh fish
column5: great service
column6: and BYOB!  Even during Covid
column7: their delivery is top-notch compared to other sushi restaurants in Hoboken (although some of the other ones are great too).  We asked one of the owners about a certain type of fish and he took the time to talk about all of the different fish they prepare and how they order daily.  Hope everyone else's experience is just as good here!"

author: Edwin Bosworth
text: 'The restaurant is excellent and roomy
column5: the menu was yummy and the rates were very fair. quickly
column6: efficient service and very attentive staff members. Recommended.'

text: 'Delicious sushi and dumplings.'

author: SCOTT STEINBRECHER
text: 'Good sushi and good prices for hoboken.'

author: Edward Charlton
text: 'This spot provides amazing service as well as delicious food. My favourite place in the city. The meals served fast and the prices are economical. Will definitely recommend this spot.'

author: Smooky 13
text: 'Best place ever ¡!¡!'

author: Adam Broitman
text: 'Good by Hoboken sushi standards'

author: Chloe Tompkins
text: 'Best sushi in Hoboken! :)'

author: Molly Rose
text: "This is my favorite sushi and byob spot in Hoboken! I'm so glad my friends took me here when I first moved to town- now it's a go to whenever someone else visits or for a guaranteed delicious date night. Service is always great
column5: the specialty rolls are always delicious
column6: and the prices make sense. Not crazy expensive or suspiciously cheap- byob always makes me feel like I can afford to order way more food :)"

author: Sadaf Farsinejad
text: 'Salmon lunch box is great!!'

author: Zach Carpenter
text: 'This restaurant has an interesting decor that doesn’t really scream sushi. But the fish was very good! The mackerel was delicious and everything you would hope from mackerel nigiri
column5: the yellowtail and salmon were also good but not as good as the mackerel. I got a selection of the rolls that were also great! The staff is attentive and friendly I wouldn’t hesitate to come here again! The only drawback that I saw was the interesting choice in decor. It wasn’t bad or seemed cheap
column6: it just seemed like the decor of a traditional american seafood restaurant and not a sushi spot. Regardless the food was good!'

author: Mel M
text: 'Love the lunch special. The service isnt friendly enough especially noticable by regulars. Kind of stopped going regularly.'

author: David
text: 'Definitely the best sushi place in Hoboken. Went here today from three recommendations. Geez these people were not playing - I have been to a ton of sushi spots but between prices
column5: byob
column6: and the people working here (definitely ask for James)

text: 'Great food great service!'

author: Eric c
text: 'So
column5: the kitchen food is  good
column6: and the salad.  I ordered sashimi
column7: felt the taste and texture were just off. It just didn’t taste fresh to me.The worst thing is we found the head chef from sushi bar didn’t  wash his hands after went out smoking。so I don’t think I would have sushi from here again.'

author: Lindsay Marra
text: 'Absolutely the best. They get their fish delivered daily!!!!! If you ever need a fresh fish restaurant in Hoboken this is the only one you can trust.'

author: Jesse
text: "Have been here couple times for dinner now. The sushi is delicious! The place is very crowded for dinner time
column5: I would suggest making a reservation! Also
column6: it's quite loud! So if you're looking for a quiet place to have a conversation
column7: this isn't the place for you. But it's a fun place with good food within walking distance of couple nice bars.\n\nHad to update as we keep coming back here! With each visit the staff is amazing and super friendly! The food is always delicious and the fish tastes fresh! Love it!"

author: Molly Lyman
text: 'I have trekked across the city multiple times for the vegan ramen at Hinodeya. It is often hard to find a vegan ramen that is as flavourful as the one at Hinodeya. Bravo!'

author: Alex Dempsey
text: 'Great lunch for $11. Got the chicken katsu and it was pretty good. The chicken was fried wonderfully and paied well with the vegetable gyoza. My friend got the chicken teriyaki and enjoyed that as well. Overall great food but smaller seating area just like most Hoboken restaurants.'

author: L Heras
text: 'Robongi is such a great sushi house to visit! The vibe is quaint and relaxed
column5: and the staff is so friendly and inviting. I enjoyed dinner here with my best friend and we both had an awesome experience with delicious food. Robongi is also BYOB so I brought a bottle of wine
column6: and they kindly put it into a bucket of ice without me asking. The sushi is so fresh and delicious and is reasonably price. I recommend the Maki combo with brown rice! Not only is the food delicious but I will also be returning do to the staff. Seriously such great staff.'

text: 'This place was great. We just moved to Hoboken. The sushi was big and tasty. The staff were amazingly friendly. BYOB is good for me!'

author: Wei Xin Yuan
text: "3.5 stars.\n\nCame here a few times around lunch time. I always ordered the ramen. They have a ramen lunch menu
column5: just ask for it if they don't give it to you automatically. The price is decent on the ramen menu.\n\nI did not think the the ramen stood out; I felt there are a lot of noodles left sitting at the bottom once I pecked away the toppings. The noodle itself was okay
column6: not very special. The soup base was again okay but did not wow or leave a lasting impression. But I prefer the price and quality of the ramen here over the south street fish & ramen co a couple blocks downtown on Washington."

text: 'Delicious authentic Jspanese food.  Great service'

author: Kelly S
text: "I have ordered from this restaurant multiple times per week for over 6 years between their Weehawken and Hoboken locations and have never had any issues however tonight I ordered at 7:30 and at 8:15 my dinner had still not arrived so I called and they made an excuse that they left my food with the doorman which I confirmed they did not and didn't make any sense anyways... I continued to call and they put me on hold because they had no idea what happened to my order...over an hour and a half later they still had no explanation as to where my food was ... Never once did they apologize or offer to fix the situation... I will never order from this restaurant again and I recommend you don't as well #fail"
